name: Passage (itch)
description:
We are all in a ritual called life, solving puzzles one after another, running to our inevitable end. Experience one's such journey of finding and trying to reach his much praised goal.

Passage is an abstract puzzle game telling a story about one's soul and body. It is played with 2 players in a cooperative manner. First player plays as a soul and the second as a body.

CONTROLS
2 x Xbox Gamepad
Movement = Analog Stick
Interaction = A

Thanks for playing. We hope you enjoy it :)

Development Team
Programming: Jan Szczepanik-Dzikowski
Graphics: Anil Demir
Music: "Ending" by Sheeba Exp
